item.title: OK, this is an irritating error, plz fix, can't compile my frikin server cuzofit
item.dc:creator: @Zenadix Zenadix
item.description:
@Zenadix wrote:

if (command.startsWith(“yell”)) {
if(muted == 1) {
sendMessage(“You are muted and cannot yell!”);
} else {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": "+command.substring(5); }
}

public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {

THOSE ARE THE "}"s u got to add

item.title: OK, this is an irritating error, plz fix, can't compile my frikin server cuzofit
item.dc:creator: @jungledude jungledude
item.description:
@jungledude wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”)) {
if(muted == 1)
sendMessage(“You are muted and cannot yell!”);
else
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": "+command.substring(5); }
}

public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {[/code]

Has a little error

Next to the part where you make it say w/e you added a } that wasn’t needed

Change the command to

if (command.startsWith("yell")) {
		if(muted == 1)
		sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
                        else
				PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": "+command.substring(5); }
		}

	public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {

[quote=“Zaroyn, post:37, topic:99268”][code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”)) {
if(muted == 1)
sendMessage(“You are muted and cannot yell!”);
else
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": "+command.substring(5); }
{

public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {[/code]

That should do it.[/quote]
That will give him more errors…

[quote=“Taylor John0, post:21, topic:99268”]geez…

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”)) {
if(muted == 1)
sendMessage(“You are muted and cannot yell!”);
else
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": "+command.substring(5); }
}

public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {[/code]

i think it’s gotta do with the lonely “else”
but iunno and don’t wanna mess it up

br3ndan, i am reporting you for being too smart and knowing my problem without me even posting it[/quote]

no, because he didn’t put the muted part in brackets. So He dose not need to do anything with that!

[quote=“Taylor John0, post:23, topic:99268”]lol, should it be

{ else }

or somtin like that?
i’m learning lol[/quote]

No, and if it was going to be like that it would be

 } else {

[quote=“Sick of Air, post:26, topic:99268”]if (command.startsWith("yell")) { if(muted == 1) sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!"); }else{ PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": "+command.substring(5); } }[/quote]

That would get him more errors its kinda the same as above…
